title: I swear Duo Bot Lanes are worse than normal Solo Queue Bot lanes....
body: I kinda cringe every time someone says it in champ select. Every duo bot lane I've ever had on my team has lost lane. Like EVERY single one, no exaggerations.

replies.body:
Pray with me.

I will teach you the AP Lee Song Support.

gg, i deserve challenjour.

duo Q is toxic to the game in general

it promotes smurfs boosting friends
it allows 2 players to dictate positions via swaps and often pick/bans
it slants the game unfavourably for the other team (used to put you against higher ranked players if you duo'ed now it doesn't)
due to riot removing it from the API info its pretty obvious riots wants duo Q to continue to help boost sales.. 


its the worst part of this game.


Everything else is awesome
i feel this so hard, unless they are smurfs they usually feed, being duo doesn't make you a better player, just puts you on tilt easier
